alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Lincoln; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 9:09PM CDT until June 13 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 909 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles east of Homer, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Farmerville, Bernice, Dubach, Vienna, Lisbon, Downsville, D Arbonne, Mount Zion, Aycock, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Corinth, Shiloh and Unionville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
